#summary API Project
#labels API

= Project =


{{{
HTTP Admin   http://cpi.cognitiveprofile.com/projects
}}}

 Projects are created by the service administrator.

== Read/Test ==

 Access HTTP OAuth Project admin

 Read project data in JSON with
{{{
  GET /projects/03efdbc/data.json
}}}
 for response Mime-Type application/json
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "03efdbc",
     "name": "Example"
   }
 ]
}}}
